Best Restaurants in Henderson 2011
Henderson Restaurant Coupons&Deals
United States > Nevada > Henderson Henderson Restaurant Guide&Dining Reviews
Featured Review Half Shell Seafood&Gaming I was at the Halfshell for a Dinner party during Christmas this past year. The table was ready when we arrived and our drinks were delivered within 10 minutes of being seated. The salad was very fresh, love the loaf of bread which is served with dinner and my shrimp was great and didn't smell fishy and I'm fussy being from San Diego, I like fresh! I would definitely recommend this restaurant and I always enjoy the upstairs patio.
Check out the Best Henderson Restaurant Deals .
Recent Henderson Restaurant Guide Reviews
Gaetano's Ristorante “We ate here in 2011 and had the BEST meal ever! The son of the owners was our waiter and he was funny, very helpful and gave us excellent service. We are returning to Las Vegas this year and are looking forward to...”
Mugshots Eatery&Pub “Love this place! Those sliders are SO good and the atmosphere is just what I like... friendly and homey. Can't get better than this Cold beer, Good food and Friendly people. Oh! and try the pancakes!”
Emery's “Great food great people great place. David Ford”
Capriotti's Sandwich Shop “Great Service and staff friendly”
China Inn “Great food great service. I would recomend all to try.”
China Inn “Take out is fast, food is great, and the people are very friendly.
Ask for their fried wontons with meat. Not on the menu, but they are so so good.”
Lucille's Smokehouse Bbq “Fun atmosphere, but the food wasn't as good as I had heard it would be... We had a couple of children with us and the people working dealt with them well. Big portions for the money. Gotta like BBQ to go there an...”
El Torito Cafe “I love this place!! I was born in Henderson and moved to Minnesota. Every time I visit that is where I eat!!! Yum, yum, yum enchiladas!”
Mugshots Eatery&Pub “The service was great, though there was a limited menu. The bar is ALL about Chicago and was packed for the game. It was cool.”
Kennedy Restaurant&Lounge “This restaurant was very good but has gone down hill. Staff turnover is extremely high. The menu has been reduced so much it does not resemble what it was 4 months ago. More of a Dennys style now instead of a Good q...”
Frediani's Authentic Italian Restaurant “My favorite restaurant in Las Vegas/Henderson by far.”
Half Shell Seafood&Gaming “As the other reviewer stated there was no one their to greet us (lunch time) for a few mins. I ordered the crab cakes which were good,but a friend ordered the tuna (sushi) roll and indicated that the rice tasted o...”
Half Shell Seafood&Gaming “I attended weekly luncheons at The Half-Shell in their upstairs meeting room. I always ordered the grilled salmon which was ALWAYS exceptional. The server was always friendly and helpful. The meeting room is quite...”
El Torito Cafe “I love this place, a locals secret. Great food, great people.”
Half Shell Seafood&Gaming “Watch your receipt, they have overcharged my friend before when she went there, then when I went their with friends they overcharged us. They gave us a bill that was double what we should have had, and they didn't ...”
Quiznos Sub “This Quiznos is probily the best in Henderson. Friendly staff and sandwhiches made right all the time with the feeling like your at home when your eating your meal. Because of this store I eat Quiznos, others are le...”
Alba Brothers Ristorante “Good food at a reasonable price. Staff was really friendly even though they were busy.”
Rubio's Restaurant #43 “For a fast food restaurant, Rubios is our favorite. The options are healthy, and it's very kid friendly - they like to investigate the tropical fish tank while we wait for our order.”
Villa Pizza - East “dirty, bad food, trouble service.” » Read More: Henderson Restaurant Reviews
